name: Advisor Physician
desc: DMG dealt by "Dewdrop" is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. After "Dewdrop" burst as a result of the character launching a Follow-up ATK or using an attack, there is a 16% fixed chance every time for them to trigger the following effect: Charge "Dewdrop" for 80% of its maximum, and deals DMG equal to 1/2/3/4 time(s) of "Dewdrop's" Charge with a 10%/40%/40%/10% fixed chance.
